attributes.additional_details:
Britain has drastically cut its aid to Yemen, which has been devastated by conflict for six years, saying the pandemic created "a difficult financial context for us all".

The planned UK cuts have been called by António Guterres, the UN Chief, a "death sentence" for the people of Yemen.

We can, and must, do more to protect people who are in the most need. Please sign to demand the UK gov. provides for those most in need.
attributes.background: We are asking the UK Government to immediately reverse its planned cut to aid for the people of Yemen who are living through what has been called the world's worst humanitarian crisis. 60% of the population relies on aid, millions of people including young children, are being abandoned by the UK.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the petition we currently have open:

Stop the proposed reduction of foreign aid to the Yemen
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577527
